episodes.title: The Spooky Sleepover: Is the next Pope going to a Liverpudlian?!
episodes.description: This week on The Spooky Sleepover, the special bonus episode of Killers, Cults and Queens, Nikki, Cheryl and the gang dive back into the dramatic downfall of Ruby Franke, Jodi Hildebrandt and the now-infamous YouTube channel 8 Passengers. But that’s not all! In Rabbit Holes of the Week, things get wild with a potentially catastrophic shipwreck lurking in the Thames, Lola Young’s rocky moment on the Coachella stage, and the question no one saw coming... could the next Pope be from Liverpool!? Got a theory? Been lost in a rabbit hole? We want to hear from YOU! Email queens@global.com to get in touch, or DM us @killerscultsqueens on Instagram. And follow Cheryl @cherydragqueen and Nikki Druce @nikkimacabrelondon. Listen on Global Player for free. Download Global Player from the app store or go to globalplayer.com.

episodes.title: The Spooky Sleepover: Inside the Waco Siege - Hostage Negotiator Jim Alvarez's Untold Insights on Trust, Tactics, and Tragedy
episodes.description: Get ready for a gripping episode as we sit down with Dr. Jim Alvarez, the legendary hostage negotiator who’s handled some of the world’s most intense and high-stakes situations. From his days as a towering 6'5" NYPD negotiator to analyzing the infamous Waco Siege, Jim takes us behind the scenes like never before. In this explosive episode, you'll discover: The real reasons the Waco Siege spiraled into a fiery tragedy—and how it could have been avoided. Shocking insider details about the FBI’s tactics, from broadcasting rabbit screams to running tanks over cars. Why "Operation Showtime" was doomed from the start. Jim’s personal experiences negotiating life-and-death situations, including his wildest hostage stories. Practical tips you can use for handling conflicts, negotiating like a pro, and even surviving a kidnapping (hint: don’t get kidnapped!). Whether you’re a true crime junkie, fascinated by the psychology of negotiation, or just love jaw-dropping stories, this episode delivers it all. 🔗 Follow Dr. Jim Alvarez: Stay updated with his latest talks and insider knowledge. https://jamesralvarez.com/ 🎧 Subscribe Now: Don’t miss our future episodes—hit that follow button! True crime meets expert insight in one unforgettable episode. Tune in now and prepare to be hooked!

episodes.title: The Waco Siege: Inside the Branch Davidians' Deadly Standoff
episodes.description: The Waco Siege: Unraveling the Branch Davidians and David Koresh’s Deadly Prophecy 🔥 Join Nikki and Cheryl as they take a deep dive into one of the most infamous cult stand-offs in American history—the Waco Sieg. In this episode, we travel back to Waco, Texas, where the self-proclaimed "sinful messiah", David Koresh (formerly Vernon Wayne Howell—yes, we’re looking at you, VERNIE 👀), took control of the Branch Davidians. What started as a religious community 🙏 quickly spiralled into chaos, leading to a catastrophic 51-day standoff ⏳ with nearly 1,000 FBI and ATF agents 🚔. Koresh had prophesied his own death at Mount Carmel but little did he know, he would trigger a deadly siege that claimed dozens of lives , shocking the world 🌎. Tune in as we uncover the events leading up to the Waco disaster, the controversial role of law enforcement 🚨, and how a twisted prophecy fuelled one of the deadliest confrontations in modern U.S. history. This episode is not suitable for listeners under the age of 18. It contains distressing details of sexual and physical abuse, including abuse against children. Listener discretion is strongly advised. Got a theory? Been lost in a rabbit hole? We want to hear from YOU! Email queens@global.com to get in touch, or DM us @killerscultsqueens on Instagram. And follow Cheryl Hole @cherylholequeen and Nikki Druce @nikkimacabrelondon. Listen on Global Player for free. Download Global Player from the app store or go to globalplayer.com. episodes.title: The Spooky Sleepover: Tammy Faye, Drag Queens, and Cult Icons: Behind the Glamour with Fenton Bailey
episodes.description: Get ready for an unforgettable episode of Killers, Cults, and Queens! Nikki Druce and Cheryl welcome the legendary Fenton Bailey—co-creator of RuPaul’s Drag Race, celebrated documentarian, and TV pioneer. Together, they delve into the fascinating world of Tammy Faye Bakker, her impact on the LGBTQ+ community, and her role as a trailblazer in television history. 🎙️ What’s Inside This Episode: The story behind Tammy Faye Bakker’s groundbreaking activism and unique drag-like persona. How Fenton’s iconic documentary, The Eyes of Tammy Faye, shaped her legacy. Behind-the-scenes insights into the creation of RuPaul’s Drag Race and its global influence. Tammy’s connection to drag culture and her enduring message of inclusivity and love. Exclusive details about the upcoming RuPaul’s DragCon and a special discount for listeners! 💄 Why You’ll Love This Episode: This is more than just a podcast episode—it’s a tribute to a true cultural icon. Whether you’re a fan of Drag Race, Tammy Faye, or the art of storytelling, you’ll leave inspired by Fenton’s insights and passion. ✨ Don’t Miss Out: Use code CHERYL10 for 10% off your tickets to RuPaul’s DragCon on January 10-11, 2024. Get your tickets at rupaulsdragcon.com ! 🎧 Listen Now: Available on Globalplayer.com , or wherever you get your podcasts. Don’t forget to follow us on Instagram at @killerscultqueens for behind-the-scenes updates. 📩 Let’s Connect: Have a question or comment? Email us at queens@global.com. 🖤 Killers, Cults, and Queens: Bringing you glamour, grit, and iconic stories every week. Subscribe now and leave a review!

episodes.title: The Rise and Fall of Jim and Tammy Faye Bakker: Scandal, Faith, and Fraud
episodes.description: 📺 Rise and Fall of Jim and Tammy Faye Bakker: Televangelism, Scandal, and a LGBTQIA+ Legacy 🌈 Cauliflower's fluffy and cabbages are green 🥦, but this week, we're diving deep into one of America's biggest televangelism scandals! Nikki and Cheryl explore the meteoric rise and shocking fall of Jim and Tammy Faye Bakker's Praise The Lord (PTL) Network ✝️. What began as a mission to spread the gospel worldwide unraveled into a notorious sex and financial fraud scandal that rocked American televangelism. Join us as we uncover the details of the scandal, the groundbreaking event that made Tammy Faye Bakker an LGBTQIA+ icon—endorsed by none other than RuPaul 👑—and the shocking secrets behind the PTL empire. Did someone really get a facelift 💉 with PTL donations? Buckle up, because Nikki and Cheryl are ready to reveal it all! 🎙️🕵️‍♀️

episodes.title: The Bizarre World of 'Queen' Romana Didulo and her Canadian QAnon Kingdom
episodes.description: The Queen of Canada… or Alien Leader? Exploring Romana Didulo & QAnon Princess, look out the window... and welcome to CANADA! Just in time for Kamala Harris vs Donald Trump we're going on a QAnon journey. This week on Killers, Cults and Queens, Cheryl takes us deep into the wildest conspiracy theory yet: the bizarre world of Romana Didulo—the self-proclaimed Queen of Canada (and the world!). 👑 Is she really an alien queen sent to heal the needy in her mysterious med beds? Or just another figure in the QAnon movement? Join Nikki and Cheryl as they unravel the truth behind QAnon, the strange obsession with adrenochrome, and Romana Didulo’s outrageous claims. If you hear us mix up Ramona and Romana, no you didn’t! 😉 Dive into this rabbit hole with us to uncover the secrets and shocking theories. Don’t miss this mind-bending episode of Killers, Cults and Queens—stream now! 🎙️ This episode is not suitable for listeners under the age of 18, and is not intended for all audiences. Listener discretion is strongly advised. Got a theory? Been lost in a rabbit hole? We want to hear from YOU! Email queens@global.com to get in touch, or DM us @killerscultsqueens on Instagram. And follow Cheryl @cheryldragqueen and Nikki Druce @nikkimacabrelondon. Listen on Global Player for free. Download Global Player from the app store or go to globalplayer.com. episodes.title: The dark rise of Jim Jones and the road to Jonestown
episodes.description: Nikki Druce and Cheryl are BACK, and they're back with a bang. This week on Killers, Cults and Queens, Nikki and Chez are headed to Guyana to experience one of the worst cults of all time... The People's Temple. How did a preacher from humble beginnings convince hundreds of people to up and leave their lives all over the world for the now infamous Jonestown? And what were the events leading up to the horrific mass suicide of almost 1,000 people? Nikki and Chez are going to find out. This episode is not suitable for listeners under the age of 18. It contains depictions of mass suicide, and discussions of coercive behaviour. It is not intended for all audiences. Listener discretion is strongly advised. Got a theory? Been lost in a rabbit hole? We want to hear from YOU! Email queens@global.com to get in touch, or DM us @killerscultsqueens on Instagram. And follow Cheryl @cheryldragqueen and Nikki Druce @nikkimacabrelondon. episodes.title: Christmas Special, the bizarre case of the Love Has Won cult
episodes.description: Ho ho ho! Christmas has come early thanks to Cheryl and Nikki Druce. High on the spirit of crimbo, they present an unreleased episode from season one… the pilot! So get in, we’re heading back 7 months to learn about the crazy Love Has Won cult. A tale of mother and father gods, colloidal silver and glitter covered desiccated corpses… what could be more festive than that… But who was mother god, and how did a potentially well intentioned community turn into a police raid that went viral? Cheryl and Nikki are going to find out. Expect baby Nikki and Chez, tails of swingers hotels and a shocking discovery. This episode contains graphic details of violence, mental and physical abuse. This episode also comes with a trigger warning for those who are currently living with or recovering from an eating disorder. It is not intended for all audiences. Listener discretion is strongly advised. For all things Killers, Cults and Queens, head over to @killerscultsqueens on Instagram. And follow Cheryl @cherylqueen and Nikki Druce @nikkimacabrelondon. episodes.title: The worst cult you’ve probably never heard of, The Ant Hill Kids
episodes.description: Nikki Druce and Cheryl are travelling to Canada to meet the WORST cult leader to have ever existed. After growing up in the stereotypical cult leader way (being told he was really smart and eventually dropping out of school), Roch Theriault spent his early 20s hell bent on creating a world for himself, one that he could control with all of his might… containing the most disturbing details Nikki and Cheryl have ever heard, they’re about to find that this ‘equalism’ community was not all that it seemed. Expect earth shattering revelations, horrific living conditions, and the story of one very very brave woman. This episode contains graphic details of violence, mental and physical abuse, including abuse against children and babies. It is not intended for all audiences. Listener discretion is strongly advised. episodes.title: The horrific sex cult inside NXIVM
episodes.description: Cheryl and Nikki Druce are heading down a road they’ve never been before to the heinous sex cult Dominus Obsequious Sororium of NXIVM. Promoted as a self improvement community, NXIVM was an MLM of gargantuan proportions, allegedly giving advice to The Bronfman Sisters and even Richard Branson… but no one could have guessed the cruel underside ruled by sick leader Keith ‘Vanguard’ Raniere and Smallville actress Alison Mack. Who was Keith Reniere, and how did a self improvement company lead to the mutilation of almost a dozen women? Cheryl and Nikki are going to find out. Expect modern day cult behaviour, a very confused Chez, and some SERIOUSLY messed up behaviour. This episode contains graphic details of violence, mental and physical abuse. This episode also comes with a trigger warning for those who are currently living with or recovering from an eating disorder. It is not intended for all audiences. Listener discretion is strongly advised. For all things Killers, Cults and Queens, head over to @killerscultsqueens on Instagram. And follow Cheryl @cheryldragqueen and Nikki Druce @nikkimacabrelondon. episodes.title: The horrific crimes of The Manson Family cult - Part 2
episodes.description: Cheryl and Nikki Druce are back to uncover the horrendous crimes of The Manson Family Cult. Picking straight back up where we left off, Cheryl and Nikki arrive at Spahn Ranch, where Charles is just about to take his love for music to a whole new level… How did a chance meeting with a Beach Boy and the classic Beatles track Helter Skelter spiral into the brutal murders of at least seven innocent people, and how did Charles manipulate his followers to do the unthinkable? Cheryl and Nikki are about to find out. Expect the house guests from hell, places that REALLY shouldn’t be used as a toilet, and the end of one of the most awful manipulators in history. This episode contains graphic details of violence and murder, including violence against a heavily pregnant woman and is not intended for all audiences. Listener discretion is strongly advised. For all things Killers, Cults and Queens, head over to @killerscultsqueens on Instagram. And follow Cheryl @cheryldragqueen and Nikki Druce @macabrelondonpodcast. episodes.title: Charles Manson, the man behind the horrific Manson Family Cult - Part 1
episodes.description: Cheryl and Nikki Druce are deep diving into the childhood of one of the most infamous cult leaders of modern day history, Charles Manson. After a rocky childhood spending most of his years in and out of schools for troubled teens and maximum security prisons, Charles heads to Berkeley to find a family of his own… Was Charles destined for the horrible fate he was racing towards, or was the nightmare ahead a product of his own making? Cheryl and Nikki are going to find out. Expect tales of the most delinquent teen of all time, an enormous amount of car stealing, and LSD fuelled orgies. This episode contains graphic details of violence and murder, and is not intended for all audiences. Listener discretion is strongly advised. 00:00 - Introduction 05:34 - Nikki sets the scene 07:15 - Charles’ Manson’s early life 20:31 - Charles gets sent to boarding school 24:08 - Charles tries to make a life on his own as a criminal apprentice 31:54 - Charles meets his first wife, Rosalie Willis 32:31 - Charles is determined to start over 34:39 - Charles learns how to charm 43:47 - Berkeley gets a new resident 45:53 - Charles starts to accumulate a following 49:55 - The original members of The Manson Family 53:14 - Charles sets off to find his makeshift family a new home 53:42 - Outro For all things Killers, Cults and Queens, head over to @killerscultsqueens on Instagram.
